title: Ticket #2850: startd expressions to enable default rules on partitionable resources
description:
We need a way for the startd to impose defaults for partitionable resources (memory, cpus, etc) in the event that the schedd does not request them.

Besides defaults, the startd may need to impose policy on the request, such as refusing a request for < 1 CPUs, and/or quantizing the value of memory.

All default expressions must be in the param table.
remarks:
2012-Apr-02 15:13:43 by tstclair:
I see no changes in the param table.

2012-Jun-06 11:20:16 by smoler:
Documentation appears in the 7.8.2 manual.
